original_title: Jack White: Live at iTunes Festival 2012
overview: As the voice, guitarist and songwriter behind The White Stripes and a member of both The Raconteurs and The Dead Weather, Jack White has indisputable rock ’n’ roll credentials. With his debut solo album, Blunderbuss, he continues to carve out blazing, soulful music.
title: Jack White: Live at iTunes Festival 2012
